WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Zod's Bow, the proc is not being modeled

Comments.Message: Yes it is, it's just not visible on the tooltip.

I just looked after you posted Jothay and did find where the code is in the Hunter Module.  It just seems strange that the Excel spreadsheet is showing such a big difference in estimated value of Zods.  The Rawr module lists Zods under the Talonstrike bow while the Excel sheet has Zods coming in as quite a big upgrade.  Likely the difference is from how the model of the proc is being handled.
Probably, and it will probably need to be looked into more deeply as I did it in kind of a hurry for a release (so people wouldn't complain about Zod's bow being really low on the list).

Side-note: to see how much damage that proc is doing, look at the tooltip on the Total DPS when you have it equipped (again, part of that last second just to make sure it works thing).

I'm looking into it now
